page.title: 19CLUBS
page.content: THE CRICKET FIELD IS ATTRACTIVELY SITUATED HALF A MILE SOUTH OF THE VILLAGE ON THE RIPON ROAD.THE CLUB FIELDS 2 TEAMS IN THE NIDDERDALE LEAGUE AND FRIENDLY GAMES ARE PLAYED REGULARLY ON SUNDAYS. VERY FEW MEMBERS ACTUALLY RESIDE IN WEST TANFIELD. THE TENNIS COURTS, SITUATED IN THE CENTRE OF THE VILLAGE WERE RESURFACED IN 1984. THE CLUB HAS 40 SENIOR AND 20 JUNIOR MEMBERS, THE LATTER HAVE HAD COACHING ON SATURDAY MORNINGS. 2 TEAMS COMPETE IN THE HARROGATE LEAGUE AND OTHER MEMBERS ARE GIVEN THE OPPORTUNITY TO PLAY IN FRIENDLY MATCHES. ALONGSIDE THE TENNIS COURTS IS THE BOWLING GREEN. THIS CLUB IS WELL SUPPORTED BY 20 MEMBERS,5 BEING LADIES.MEMBERS PLAY MOST EVENINGS AND TAKE PART IN FRIENDLY MATCHES.
